name: Zib Deviating Administration
title: HCIM Deviating Administration
description: In the administration, was there a deviation from the medication or administration agreement? This can be a deviation in product, time, amount, route of administration or administering speed or foregoing administration altogether.
purpose: Added to define if the medication adminstration deviates from the medication request is was based on.

element.definition: In the administration, was there a deviation from the medication or administration agreement? This can be a deviation in product, time, amount, route of administration or administering speed or foregoing administration altogether
Reason why the medication was not taken or administered or was taken or administered differently. Here, you can choose to enter text or one of the codes.
